Bhojana Sutta：1．Bhojana Sutta．He who gives food gives four things to the receiver thereof：life，beauty，comfort，and strength．A．ii．64．

2．Bhojana Sutta． In giving a meal，the giver gives five things：life，beauty，comfort，strength，and ready understanding （patibhāna），and he himself also becomes a partaker of these things．A．iii．42．
